titleStmt.title: Das Musikalische Opfer
1. Satz, Trio
BWV 1079
Musikalisches Opfer <2. Triosonate c-Moll für Flöte, Violine und Basso continuo>

editorialDecl.p: This handcoded file represents an example for figured Bass, to be found in the 3rd staff. The first and second system are encoded in excerpts. Measures 27 to 34 and 38 to 46 are not encoded. You can find the complete encoding in MEI2012/handcodings/Bach_MusikalischesOpfer_Trio.
